Name: Labyrinthian: Lost 'Til Dawn
About the game: Awakening in the woods, you must find your way out. The further you venture, the more monsters that will come for you. Use your trusty flashlight and arsenal of tools to fend them off until day. Features: -variety of monster types with different behaviors, sounds, and personalities -small arsenal of tools designed to provide different uses in aiding the player's survival -level up and perk chart as player advances -unlimited gameplay mode -different ending depending on player choices -atmospheric forest maze with plenty of ambience for an unsettling first experience
